sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Coal Products Commission Transfer Act.

sections.heading: All of the property and powers heretofore acquired by or vested in
sections.text:
the Illinois Coal Products Commission are transferred to the Department of
Natural Resources, as successor to the Department of Mines and Minerals
under the Department of Natural Resources Act. The Department may exercise
such powers if it deems such
action advisable; otherwise, the Department shall dispose of the property
acquired pursuant to this Act in such manner as may be most advantageous
to the State of Illinois.
